content.question: The long-term economic effect in Europe of the establishment of trading networks and colonies such as the one described in the passage was

choices.label: the increased power of trading centers in the Italian city-states
a shift in the center of economic power from the Mediterranean to the Atlantic states
an increase in the cost of imported luxury goods

content.answer: a shift in the center of economic power from the Mediterranean to the Atlantic states

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
